trans-unit.source: Amplifire
trans-unit.target: Amplifire

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a creature card. Put the revealed cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.

trans-unit.source: Simic Ascendancy
trans-unit.target: Simic Ascendancy

trans-unit.source: {1}{G}{U}: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. Whenever one or more +1/+1 counters are put on a creature you control, put that many growth counters on Simic Ascendancy. At the beginning of your upkeep, if Simic Ascendancy has twenty or more growth counters on it, you win the game.
